kpi_info.title: HS-SCCH POWER DISTRIBUTION - CLASS 5
kpi_info.use: The HS-SCCH transmit power measurement. Number of TTIs matching to power limits of class 5 (default range; over 1.6 W). UPDATED:The HS-SCCH transmit power is measured by each active TTI (when sending data) in BTS. The each active TTI increments the correct class of the HS-SCCH power distribution. I.e. the number of TTIs (2 ms) in different class indicates the amount of time spent
